title: Emerald & Pearl Haar Set: A Timeless Grandeur
materials: Simulated Diamonds (CZ). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite set features a floral-inspired design, with emeralds nestled within a halo of sparkling simulated diamonds. Delicate pearl drops add a touch of grace. The necklace boasts a modern mesh chain, offering comfort and style. The matching Jhumki earrings echo the necklace's design, completing the set with elegance.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Suitable for traditional events like Muhurtham
and any festive occasion where you want to make a statement. Its contemporary design makes it equally fitting for modern parties and upscale events.
description: This Haar set combines traditional elegance with contemporary design, making it a versatile addition to your jewelry collection. The high-quality emeralds and South Sea pearls ensure a luxurious feel. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees long-lasting shine. A perfect heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
